auth.signInDescription: Sign in to manage your pathfinder games
auth.joinDescription: You've been invited to be a game operator. Create your account to get started.
auth.registrationFailed: Registration failed. The invite may have expired.

admin.title: Operators
admin.description: Manage game operators and send invitations
admin.inviteDescription: Send an email invitation. They will receive a link to create their account.

game.importDescription: Upload a game export file to create a new game with all bases, challenges, and teams
game.importDatesNote: Game dates are optional and can be set later from the overview page

games.title: Games
games.description: Manage your scout games and events
games.noGames: No games yet. Create your first one!
games.createDescription: Set up the basics. You can configure bases, challenges, and teams after creation.
games.gameDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this game is about...

overview.notEnoughChallenges: Not enough challenges: {{bases}} bases but only {{challenges}} challenges

gameOperators.title: Game Operators
gameOperators.description: Manage who can operate this game
gameOperators.inviteDescription: Enter the email of an existing operator to invite them to this game. They will be notified by email and can accept the invitation on the platform.
gameOperators.inviteError: Failed to send invitation. Please try again.

bases.title: Bases
bases.noBasesDescription: Add your first base to get started!
bases.name: Name
bases.fixedChallengeHint: Leave empty to allow random assignment when game goes live
bases.clickMapToSelect: Click on the map to select location
bases.requirePresenceHint: Players must be physically at this base to submit their answer
bases.hiddenHint: Players won't see this base on the map until they check in (e.g. via NFC scan)

challenges.title: Challenges
challenges.contentPlaceholder: Full challenge instructions shown before solving...
challenges.completionContentPlaceholder: Rich content shown after the challenge is completed...

assignments.title: Assignments
assignments.description: Link challenges to bases. Fixed assignments override random ones.
assignments.fixedDescription: These are set directly on the base and cannot be randomized
assignments.manualDescription: Assign challenges to bases. Unassigned bases with no fixed challenge will get random challenges at game start.
assignments.addForBase: Add or manage assignments for this base.
assignments.fullyAssigned: This base is fully assigned for all teams.
assignments.modeLockedAllTeams: This base uses an "All Teams" assignment. Remove it before adding team-specific assignments.
assignments.noTeamsAvailable: No teams available for additional assignments on this base.
assignments.conflictGeneric: This assignment conflicts with existing data.
assignments.unassignedNote_one: {{count}} base without assignments will receive random challenges per team when the game starts.
assignments.unassignedNote_other: {{count}} bases without assignments will receive random challenges per team when the game starts.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Send messages to teams in the field
notifications.composeDescription: Send a notification to all teams or a specific team

mapPage.title: Live Map
mapPage.description: Track bases and team locations in real-time
mapPage.mapDescription: Leaflet map showing base locations and team position pings. Bases appear as pin markers, team positions appear as colored dots matching team colors.
mapPage.selectTeamView: Select a team to view individual progress

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.noScores: No scores yet. The game is just getting started!

results.title: Final Results
results.finalStandingsDesc: All teams ranked by total points

settings.title: Settings
settings.gameDetailsDescription: Update the game name, description, and schedule
settings.exportDescription: Download a JSON file with all game configuration (bases, challenges, teams, assignments) that can be imported into a new game
settings.revertToSetupDesc: Move the game back to setup mode. Assignments will be cleared and re-generated when going live again.
settings.revertToLiveDesc: Re-open the game so teams can continue playing. All progress is preserved.
settings.progressQuestion: What should happen to team progress?
settings.keepProgressDesc: Check-ins, submissions, and scores are preserved. When the game goes live again, teams continue where they left off.
settings.eraseProgressDesc: All check-ins, submissions, activity logs, and team locations are permanently deleted. Teams start fresh.
settings.dangerZoneDescription: Irreversible actions that affect the entire game
settings.uniformAssignmentDescription: When enabled, all teams get the same challenge at each base. When disabled, each team gets a different random challenge per base.
settings.deleteConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this game?
settings.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. All bases, challenges, teams, and assignments will be permanently deleted.
